title: go1: internal compiler error: in do_determine_type, at go/gofrontend/expressions.h:881
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

gccgo -c foo.go

What do you see instead?

go1: internal compiler error: in do_determine_type, at go/gofrontend/expressions.h:881

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

gccgo

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

URL: svn://gcc.gnu.org/svn/gcc/trunk
Repository Root: svn://gcc.gnu.org/svn/gcc
Repository UUID: 138bc75d-0d04-0410-961f-82ee72b054a4
Revision: 167678
Attachments: 1. foo.go (88 bytes)
